docs.lead_paragraph: “Brotherhood,” which begins its third exceptional season on Sunday, is yet another Showtime drama featuring main characters who rationalize self-interest as altruism.

headline.seo: On Showtime, a Mobster and a Politico, Neither Rolling in Clover
headline.main: Mobster and Politician, Neither Rolling in Clover

docs.lead_paragraph: Women pay much more than men for individual insurance policies providing identical coverage, according to new data from insurance companies and online brokers.

headline.main: Women Buying Health Policies Pay a Penalty
headline.sub: Premiums Are Higher  Than Those  for  Men  ;
headline.print_headline: Women Buying Health Insurance Pay a Penalty
